description:
In this episode, see high school boys get chased by their friend`s sister, hang out on the first day of a new term, secretly back up a friend`s sister, console a girl, look for lost puppies, and try out their new super moves.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Danshi Koukousei to Seinaru Yoru / Danshi Koukousei to Shin Gakki / Danshi Koukousei to Imouto no Nayami / Danshi Koukousei to Ringo-chan no Nayami / Danshi Koukousei to Motoharu no Nayami / Danshi Koukousei to Hissatsu Shoot / Joshikousei wa Ijou "Kako"

High School Boys and O Holy Nights / High School Boys and the New Term / High School Boys and the Little Sister`s Troubles / High School Boys and Ringo`s Troubles / High School Boys and Motoharu`s Troubles / High School Boys and Secret Moves / High School Girls Are Funky: The Past
男子高校生と聖なる夜 / 男子高校生と新学期 / 男子高校生と妹の悩み / 男子高校生とりんごちゃんの悩み / 男子高校生とモトハルの悩み / 男子高校生と必殺シュート / 女子高生は異常「過去」
